resources.string: I was born in 11/12/2000 on Guatemala, by my mother Silvia and my father Roberto. \nI started school at the age of 5 in "Lluvias del Saber" that closed that year, so I moved to "Marubal" for one year until I went to MacDermont School were I finished my school days. \nSo I decided to study Computer Science because I like technology and I like to innovate so it was the perfect career, the FJBG grant me a scholarship for UVG, I liked my first year a lot. I hope that I do the same with this year.
